author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Allergan Exercises Option To Acquire Compound From Aptinyx Discovery Platform
text:
May 22 (Reuters) - Allergan plc:
* ALLERGAN EXERCISES OPTION TO ACQUIRE COMPOUND FROM APTINYX DISCOVERY PLATFORM UNDER ONGOING RESEARCH COLLABORATION
* APTINYX - ALLERGAN EXERCISED OPTION TO ACQUIRE DRUG CANDIDATE AGN-241751, AN ORAL SMALL-MOLECULE N-METHYL-D-ASPARTATE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
